name: Knight Tales
description:
Knight Tales is a game in development that takes place in a foreign kingdom.

In this game, you are not a Super Hero and you are not invincible. 

Your enemies will be tenacious and will take every oppotunities to take you down.

Loot your way to victory in 2 different modes.

Modes:

  •  Single Player or Local Coop Adventure Mode
  • 1v1 Mode

Player 1 Controls:

  • Move: [WASD]
  • Attack: [SPACE]
  • Interact: [E]
  • Dive/Roll/Dash: [Left Shirt]

Player 2 Controls:

  • Move: [ARROW KEYS]
  • Attack: [RIGHT ENTER]
  • Interact: [NUM PAD 4]
  • Dive/Roll/Dash: [RIGHT SHIFT]

Player 1 and 2 Xbox Controller Control:

  • Move: [LEFT JOYSTICK]
  • Attack: [RIGHT TRIGGER]
  • Interact: [X]
  • Dive/Roll/Dash: [B]

Note: Controls are subject to changes.

Note: This game is in a VERY early state. There could be a lot of bugs and glitches.

If you want to report anything to me, please email me at: Eracc1994@gmail.com

Thank you and have fun!
